title: Must Read: Macy's to Develop TV Series About Women in Retail, Sir John Appointed Creative Director of Medicube
description: These are the stories making headlines in fashion on Tuesday. Macy's is looking to build upon its already massive presence within American television. On top of its Fourth of July and Thanksgiving Day Parade special programming, the department store has now acquired an option to develop a scripted ...Continue reading
author: Brooke Frischer
